{ "Playlists": [ { "Id": "62c03853-0d6b-45ed-88ea-abff01797007", "Title": "Break Point", "Slug": "podcast", "Description": "Break Point is the podcast for ServiceNow admins, developers, and builders of all skill levels. Join your host, Chuck Tomasi, Sr. Developer Evangelist, as he interviews ServiceNow product managers and developers about the Now Platform features. Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.", "DescriptionHtml": "

Break Point is the podcast for ServiceNow admins, developers, and builders of all skill levels. Join your host, Chuck Tomasi, Sr. Developer Evangelist, as he interviews ServiceNow product managers and developers about the Now Platform features. Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.

", "ProgramId": "482f14e7-034f-4f55-a28a-abff01781da7", "RssFeedUrl": "https://www.omnycontent.com/d/playlist/922e0f19-2d84-4485-835c-a83f00036b00/482f14e7-034f-4f55-a28a-abff01781da7/62c03853-0d6b-45ed-88ea-abff01797007/podcast.rss", "EmbedUrl": "https://omny.fm/shows/break-point/playlists/podcast/embed", "ArtworkUrl": "https://www.omnycontent.com/d/playlist/922e0f19-2d84-4485-835c-a83f00036b00/482f14e7-034f-4f55-a28a-abff01781da7/62c03853-0d6b-45ed-88ea-abff01797007/image.jpg?t=1597690112&size=Medium", "NumberOfClips": 4, "Visibility": "Public", "Categories": [], "DirectoryLinks": { "ApplePodcasts": "https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/break-point/id1526244528", "GooglePodcasts": "https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cub21ueWNvbnRlbnQuY29tL2QvcGxheWxpc3QvOTIyZTBmMTktMmQ4NC00NDg1LTgzNWMtYTgzZjAwMDM2YjAwLzQ4MmYxNGU3LTAzNGYtNGY1NS1hMjhhLWFiZmYwMTc4MWRhNy82MmMwMzg1My0wZDZiLTQ1ZWQtODhlYS1hYmZmMDE3OTcwMDcvcG9kY2FzdC5yc3M?sa=X&ved=0CBYQ27cFahcKEwjY3diHmYDrAhUAAAAAHQAAAAAQAg", "Spotify": "https://open.spotify.com/show/20gZbxGmf7c1WperGjzg18", "Stitcher": "https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/servicenow-community-podcasts/break-point", "TuneIn": "https://tunein.com/podcasts/Technology-Podcasts/Break-Point-p1350240/", "GooglePlay": null, "RssFeed": "https://omny.fm/shows/break-point/playlists/podcast.rss" } } ] }

{ "Playlists": [ { "Id": "62c03853-0d6b-45ed-88ea-abff01797007", "Title": "Break Point", "Slug": "podcast", "Description": "Break Point is the podcast for ServiceNow admins, developers, and builders of all skill levels. Join your host, Chuck Tomasi, Sr. Developer Evangelist, as he interviews ServiceNow product managers and developers about the Now Platform features. Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.", "DescriptionHtml": "

Break Point is the podcast for ServiceNow admins, developers, and builders of all skill levels. Join your host, Chuck Tomasi, Sr. Developer Evangelist, as he interviews ServiceNow product managers and developers about the Now Platform features. Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.

{ "Playlists": [ { "Id": "62c03853-0d6b-45ed-88ea-abff01797007", "Title": "Break Point", "Slug": "podcast", "Description": "Break Point is the podcast for ServiceNow admins, developers, and builders of all skill levels. Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.", "DescriptionHtml": "

Chuck also interviews ServiceNow customers to discuss apps they've built, challenges they faced, and how they solved them. Take a break with Break Point.
